name: Pubnub-android-lolli-chat
tagline: An android chatting application that makes use of many PubNub features.
body:
### PubChat
An Android chatting application build using many PubNub features. 

This demo shows you how to use:
- Basic Pub/Sub
- Channels for chat rooms
- Presence
- Push Notifications
- History and playback on channels
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
